CodeList.Title: Measured attribute code for weight statement (UNCL6313 Subset) T122

Code.Name: Net net weight
Code.Description: Weight (mass) if goods without any packaging

Code.Name: Net weight
Code.Description: Weight (mass) of goods including any packing normally going with them to a buyer in a retail sale.

Code.Name: Gross weight
Code.Description: Weight (mass) of goods including packing but excluding the carrier's equipment.

Code.Name: Gross volume
Code.Description: The volume unadjusted for factors such as temperature or gravity.

Code.Name: Net volume
Code.Description: The volume after adjustment for factors such as temperature or gravity.

Code.Name: Tare Weight
Code.Description: The weight of a container or packaging material that is empty and not holding any product. It is the weight of the vehicle or container itself, excluding any cargo, passengers, or other materials it may carry.
